EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_dotNET CloudNative Bootcamp_Seattle_Q217.Reminder NET Bootcamp Ema
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: .NET Cloud-Native Bootcamp Tomorrow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, We look forward to seeing you tomorrow for the .NET Cloud-Native Bootcamp, hosted by Pivotal at Galvanize - Pioneer Square. As a reminder, this will be a full, fun day to learn about patterns and technology. We’ll take care of breakfast and lunch, so don’t worry about packing anything! Please make sure that you’ve installed the Cloud Foundry CLI <[[https://docs.cloudfoundry.org/cf-cli/install-go-cli.html#installer]]> (versions exist for Windows, Mac, and Linux) on your laptop. Also, be sure to have a development environment handy, as we’ll be slinging some code together. Pivotal will take care of providing the initial source code, and hosting environment. If you’d like to read up on Cloud Foundry <[[http://docs.pivotal.io/pivotalcf/1-10/concepts/index.html]]> and Steeltoe <[[https://steeltoe.io/]]>, feel free. But don’t worry, we’ll do an engaging deep dive together tomorrow.
Date: Tuesday, June 20, 2017
Time:
8:30AM to 4:45PM
Location: Galvanize Seattle - Pioneer Square 111 S. Jackson St. Seattle, WA, 98104 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/111+S+Jackson+St,+Seattle,+WA+98104/@47.5989617,-122.3359876,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x54906aa4e81f689f:0x6f218418c4ae7643!8m2!3d47.5989617!4d-122.3337989?hl=en]]>)
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please contact the organizer at rseroter@pivotal.io <[[mailto:rseroter@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you there!
The Pivotal Team See Agenda <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/dot-NET-Cloud-Native-Bootcamp-Seattle.html]]>
